thread.section_title: Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Loved It!
thread.title_full: Loved It! - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DJC027
title: Loved It!
text: Stayed for five nights in March 2017. From booking to arrival to stay, staff was warm, helpful, and friendly. Rooms are great. Location - fantastic. Walking distance to theaters, NYC Public library, Grand Central. Hotel it self is clean, luxurious, intimate. The 14th floor bar and fireplace reception area is wonderful. Nice breakfast in coz 2nd floor dining room. And the books and decor - heaven! Having visited NYC six times over the past 4 years and stayed at six different hotels, I think that we finally found our NYC hotel.
